text: The Burning is a 1981 slasher movie directed by Tony Maylam and produced by Harvey Weinstein. It starred Brian Matthews, Brian Becker, Leah Ayers, Jason Alexander, Holly Hunter, and Fisher Stevens. It was distributed by Miramax Films. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1981 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Canadian horror movies Category:American independent movies
title: The Burning (movie)
